page.title: 06Mollington Village Hall #1
page.content: The Village Hall lies adjacent to the Village School and is used by the school for meals and daily classes. The Hall is at the centre of community life in the Village being the meeting place for groups,weddings and similar functions. Many organisations use the Hall for their weekly meetings,the main ones are:- 1.The School for daily meals and Physical Training classes. 2.The Womens Institute for weekly meetings. 3.The Crusaders Youth Club for weekly meetings. 4.The Playgroup for daily activities. 5.The Table Tennis club each week. 6.The North Banbury Scout Group for meetings every Monday and Friday. 7.The weekly Vicars club for 6-12 year olds as a junior youth club.
